author: 77ncaachamps
title: ~6 cents for each new piece = peace of mind for some
review:
When compared to #10698 Large Creative Box (790 pieces), you cannot go wrong for the price per piece since they retail at the same price and you get an additional 210 pieces with this set.

But what you give up is less colors of the rainbow and more standard colors.

Box/Instructions

The box has two seals at the top near the red handle. It picks up like a suitcase with two flaps that fold and overlap the sides. There isn't a seal on the side flaps.

It does feel rather light for 1000 pieces, though.

Lego has retired this product as of 2015.

Parts

Generic parts for basic building.

Minifigures

N/A

The build

N/A

The completed model

Whatever you desire!

Overall opinion

**** for pieces.

*** for color varieties.

**** for value.
